name: Belligerence Unfettered
description:
When the character to which this is attached would be defeated: Remove this effect, ensure the character will not be defeated, and heal them to 1 HP.
Usage(s): 2
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When the character to which this is attached would be defeated:</color> Remove this effect, ensure the character $[K54|s1], and heal them to 1 HP.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 2</color>
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When the character to which this is attached would be defeated:</color> Remove this effect, ensure the character <color=#FFFFFFFF>will not be defeated</color>, and heal them to 1 HP.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF><color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>: 2</color>
